RESET_PASSWORD.MESSAGE: Your password is about to be reset. How would you like to receive it?
RESET_PASSWORD.CONFIRMATION_MESSAGE: Your password has been reset. Within a few minutes, you will receive by sms / mail a temporary password.

RESET_PASSWORD.GENERAL_ERROR: An error occured while sending the password. Please retry again.
RESET_PASSWORD.NO_ACCOUNT: There is no account associated with these credentials.
